comments.comment: The key 'grafana-agent' and its 'name' field are correctly using kebab-case and match each other as required
Grafana Agent tools array has been correctly populated with 7 tools matching the expected set [Bash, Read, Write, Edit, Glob, Grep, WebFetch]
The key 'vllm-agent' and its 'name' field are correctly using kebab-case and match each other as required
vLLM Agent description has been populated with a meaningful 128-character description covering deployment, management, and integration aspects
vLLM Agent tools array has been populated with 6 tools [Bash, Read, Write, Edit, Glob, Grep], which meets the minimum requirement of 3+ tools
All 27 agent keys in the registry now consistently use kebab-case naming convention, which is excellent for consistency
Cross-field consistency is maintained - all agent 'name' fields match their respective YAML keys, ensuring data integrity

test_results.summary: Test command was not executed due to approval requirements. Manual verification shows all Task A1 requirements have been correctly implemented.
